motivational_prompt: Ask yourself: did you really do anything if there is no troi-entry for it?
Is there anything better than a timesheet filled out before the end of the month?
Have you tried adding a time entry BEFORE doing the work? That's life on the edge, you will never feel the same again!
<name>, the one thing missing from making this <weekday> perfect is: ... drum roll ... filling your time sheet!
